function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Noise pollution in residential clusters due to urban design and building configurations","Impact":"Negative impact on mental and physical health, sleep patterns, and overall well-being of residents","Mitigation":"Implement soundproofing measures and urban planning guidelines to reduce noise pollution","Technologies":"Acoustic louvers, soundproof windows, active noise cancellation (ANC)","People":"Residents, workers, students in residential clusters","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building developers"},{"Description":"Lack of acoustic privacy in courtyard houses due to inadequate design","Impact":"Decreased privacy and increased exposure to external noise sources","Mitigation":"Optimize courtyard design for a shielding effect, use of solid walls and fences","Technologies":"Optimized courtyard design, solid walls, fences","People":"Residents of courtyard houses","Owner":"Architects, building developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate arrangement of balconies in relation to noise sources (e.g., highways)","Impact":"Disruption of outdoor space and exposure to high levels of noise pollution","Mitigation":"Strategic placement of balconies in protected areas, use of fences and solid walls to deflect noise","Technologies":"Strategic balcony placement, fences, solid walls","People":"Residents with balconies facing noise sources","Owner":"Architects, building developers"}]}
